results.name: Résop Paz Yandere True ( Rpyt ) ( R-pyt ) ( Resop Paz )

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later.
  • Processor: Processor 1.6 GHz or equivalent.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with at least 128 MB of video memory.
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: The game is usually well optimized overall. Even with an old PC, you should be able to run it unless you are recording at the same time in good quality. In that case, you will need a good PC. Keep in mind that newer configurations are not mandatory, but it is recommended to be at least above Windows XP and have a screen of at least 1080p. Otherwise, you can still play, but the graphics will be much less beautiful, considering that the game images are generally sized at 1920x1080p.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X or Intel Core i5-11400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Audigy RX
  • Additional Notes: The game is usually well optimized overall. Even with an old PC, you should be able to run it unless you are recording at the same time in good quality. In that case, you will need a good PC. Keep in mind that newer configurations are not mandatory, but it is recommended to be at least above Windows XP and have a screen of at least 1080p. Otherwise, you can still play, but the graphics will be much less beautiful, considering that the game images are generally sized at 1920x1080p.
